# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to entities before using them
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Make sure to connect the steam engine to a power network before using it
### Errors when using electricity group without being plugged in
-  Make sure to plug in the electricity group to an electric network before using it

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
